Existence of files or paths containing t.Data: Windows Event ID 4663, Windows Event ID 4656, Zeek file.log
Existence of files or paths containing t.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4663, 4656, and Zeek file.log for filenames or paths containing the Unicode character \u202E or its representations (%E2%80%AE). Use string matching and regular expressions to identify these patterns. Use descriptive statistics on the frequency of file events containing this character to identify unusual occurrences.

RTLO character found within registry key.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4657 for registry key or value names containing the RTLO character. Analyze Zeek file.log for common malicious file extensions (e.g., .exe, .scr, .js) transmitted over the network and inspect filenames for the RTLO character. Correlate findings with observed process creation events if available.
